original: asmeraṃ galitāśrugadgadapadaṃ bhinnabhruvā yady abhūd vaktreṣv ekam api svayaṃ sa bhagavāṃs tan me pramāṇaṃ śivaḥ // VidSrk_45.5 *(1546) //
analyzed: asmeram galita aśru gadgada padam bhinna bhruvā yadi abhūt vaktreṣu ekam api svayam sa bhagavān tat me pramāṇam śivaḥ  /

original: devo yady api te guruḥ sa bhagavān ardhenducūḍāmaṇiḥ kṣoṇīmaṇḍalam ekaviṃśatim idaṃ vārāñ jitaṃ yady api /
analyzed: devaḥ yadi api te guruḥ sa bhagavān ardha indu cūḍāmaṇiḥ kṣoṇī maṇḍalam ekaviṃśatim idam vārām jitam yadi api

original: draṣṭavyo 'sy amum eva bhārgavabaṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kuṭhāraṃ vahan paulastyasya puraḥ praṇāmaracitapratyagrasevāñjaliḥ // VidSrk_45.6 *(1547) //
analyzed: draṣṭavyaḥ si amum eva bhārgava baṭaḥ kaṇṭhe kuṭhāram vahan paulastyasya puras praṇāma racita pratyagra sevā añjaliḥ  /

original: rudrādes tulanaṃ svakaṇṭhavipinacchedo harer vāsanaṃ kārāveśmani puṣpakasya ca jayo yasyedṛśaḥ kelayaḥ /
analyzed: rudra ādeḥ tulanam sva kaṇṭha vipina chedaḥ hareḥ vāsanam kārā veśmani puṣpakasya ca jayaḥ yasya īdṛśaḥ kelayaḥ

original: so 'haṃ durjayabāhudaṇḍasacivo laṅkeśvaras tasya me kā ślāghā ghuṇajarjareṇa dhanuṣā kṛṣṭena bhagnena vā // VidSrk_45.7 *(1548) //
analyzed: saḥ ham durjaya bāhudaṇḍa sacivaḥ laṅkā īśvaraḥ tasya me kā ślāghā ghuṇa jarjareṇa dhanuṣā kṛṣṭena bhagnena vā  /

original: vīraprasūr jayati bhārgavareṇukaiva yat tvāṃ trilokatilakaṃ sutam abhyasūta /
analyzed: vīra prasūḥ jayati bhārgava reṇukā eva yat tvām triloka tilakam sutam abhyasūta

original: śakrebhakumbhataṭakhaṇḍanacaṇḍadhāmā yenaiṣa me na gaṇito yudhi candrahāsaḥ // VidSrk_45.8 *(1549) //
analyzed: śakra ibha kumbha taṭa khaṇḍana caṇḍa dhāmā yena eṣa me na gaṇitaḥ yudhi candrahāsaḥ  /

original: rāme rudraśarāsanaṃ tulayati smitvā sthitaṃ pārthivaiḥ siñjāsañjanatatpare 'vahasitaṃ dattvā mithas tālikāḥ /
analyzed: rāme rudra śarāsanam tulayati smitvā sthitam pārthivaiḥ siñjā sañjana tatpare vahasitam dattvā mithas tālikāḥ

original: āropya pracalāṅgulīkiśalaye mlānaṃ guṇāsphālane sphārākarṣaṇabhagnaparvaṇi punaḥ siṃhāsane mūrchitam // VidSrk_45.9 *(1550) //
analyzed: āropya pracala aṅgulī kiśalaye mlānam guṇa āsphālane sphāra ākarṣaṇa bhagna parvaṇi punar siṃhāsane mūrchitam  /

original: pṛthvi sthirā bhava bhujaṃgama dhārayaināṃ tvaṃ kūrmarāja tad idaṃ dvitayaṃ dadhīthāḥ /
analyzed: pṛthvi sthirā bhava bhujaṃgama dhāraya enām tvam kūrma rāja tat idam dvitayam dadhīthāḥ

original: dikkuñjarāḥ kuruta tattritaye didhīrṣāṃ rāmaḥ karotu harakārmukam ātatajyam // VidSrk_45.10 *(1551) //

original: rājaśekharasyāmī
analyzed: rājaśekharasya amī

original: uttīrṇo 'mbunidhir dṛśaiva viṣadais tenāṭṭahāsormibhir laṅkeśasya ca laṅghito diśi diśi krūraḥ pratāpānalaḥ // VidSrk_45.11 *(1552) //

original: abhinandasya
analyzed: abhinandasya

analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ kṛttaḥ daśamukha bhujaḥ tasya tasya eva vīryam labdhvā dṛpyanti adhikam adhikam bāhavaḥ śiṣyamāṇāḥ

original: yady acchinnaṃ daśamukhaśiras tasya tasyaiva kāntau saṃkrāmantyām atiśayavatī śeṣavaktreṣu lakṣmīḥ // VidSrk_45.12 *(1553) //

original: murāreḥ
analyzed: murāreḥ

original: bhagnaṃ deva samastavānarabhaṭair naṣṭaṃ ca yūthādhipaiḥ kiṃ dhairyeṇa puro vilokya daśagrīvo 'yam ārād abhūt /
analyzed: bhagnam deva samasta vānara bhaṭaiḥ naṣṭam ca yūtha adhipaiḥ kim dhairyeṇa puras vilokya daśagrīvaḥ yam ārāt abhūt

original: itthaṃ jalpati sambhramolbaṇamukhe sugrīvarāje muhus tenākekaram īkṣitaṃ daśa śanair bāṇān ṛjūkurvatā // VidSrk_45.13 *(1554) //
analyzed: ittham jalpati sambhrama ulbaṇa mukhe sugrīva rāje muhur tena a kekaram īkṣitam daśa śanais bāṇān ṛjūkurvatā  /

original: bhramaṇajavasamīraiḥ śerate śālaṣaṇḍā mama nakhakuliśāgrair grāvagarbhāḥ sphuṭanti /
analyzed: bhramaṇa java samīraiḥ śerate śāla ṣaṇḍāḥ mama nakha kuliśa agraiḥ grāva garbhāḥ sphuṭanti

original: ajagaram api cāhaṃ muṣṭiniṣpiṣṭavaktraṃ nijabhujatarumūlasyālavālaṃ karomi // VidSrk_45.14 *(1555) //
analyzed: ajagaram api ca aham muṣṭi niṣpiṣṭa vaktram nija bhuja taru mūlasya ālavālam karomi

original: kṛṣṭā yena śiroruheṣu rudatī pāñcālarājātmajā yenāsyāḥ paridhānam apy apahṛtaṃ rājñāṃ gurūṇāṃ puraḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṭā yena śiroruheṣu rudatī pāñcāla rāja ātmajā yena asyāḥ paridhānam api apahṛtam rājñām gurūṇām puras

original: yasyoraḥsthalaśoṇitāsavam ahaṃ pātuṃ pratijñātavān so 'yaṃ madbhujapañjare nipatitaḥ saṃrakṣyatāṃ kauravāḥ // VidSrk_45.15 *(1556) //
analyzed: yasya uraḥ sthala śoṇita āsavam aham pātum pratijñātavān saḥ yam mad bhuja pañjare nipatitaḥ saṃrakṣyatām kauravāḥ

original: kapole jānakyāḥ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi smarasmeraṃ gaṇḍoḍḍamarapulakaṃ vaktrakamalam /
analyzed: kapole jānakyāḥ kari kalabha danta dyuti muṣi smara smeram gaṇḍa uḍḍamara pulakam vaktra kamalam

original: muhuḥ paśyañ śrutvā rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭagranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ // VidSrk_45.16 *(1557) //
analyzed: muhur paśyam śrutvā rajanicara senā kalakalam jaṭā jūṭa granthim draḍhayati raghūṇām parivṛḍhaḥ  /

original: harir alasavilocanaḥ sagarvaṃ balam avalokya punar jagāma nidrām /*
analyzed: hariḥ alasa vilocanaḥ sa garvam balam avalokya punar jagāma nidrām

original: meṭhasya
analyzed: meṭhasya

original: kiṃ cākāṇḍakṛtodyamas tripathagāsaṃcārinaukāgaṇo gīrvāṇendraphaṇīndrayor api dadau śaṅkāṃ viśaṅko 'pi yaḥ // VidSrk_45.18 *(1559) //
analyzed: kim ca akāṇḍa kṛta udyamaḥ tripathagā saṃcāri naukā gaṇaḥ gīrvāṇa indra phaṇi indrayoḥ api dadau śaṅkām viśaṅkaḥ pi yaḥ  /

analyzed: narasiṃhasya

original: mainākaḥ kim ayaṃ ruṇaddhi gagane manmārgam avyāhataṃ śaktis tasya kutaḥ sa vajrapatanād bhīto mahendrād api /

original: tārkṣyaḥ so 'pi samaṃ nijena vibhunā jānāti māṃ rāvaṇaṃ vijñātaṃ sa jaṭāyur eṣa jarasā kliṣṭo vadhaṃ vāñchati // VidSrk_45.19 *(1560) //

original: putras tvaṃ tripuradruhaḥ punar ahaṃ śiṣyaḥ kim etāvatā tulyaḥ so 'pi kṛtas tavāyam adhikaḥ kodaṇḍadīkṣāvidhiḥ /
analyzed: putraḥ tvam tripura druhaḥ punar aham śiṣyaḥ kim etāvatā tulyaḥ saḥ kṛtaḥ tava ayam adhikaḥ kodaṇḍa dīkṣā vidhiḥ

original: tatrādhāranibandhano yadi bhaved ādheyadharmodayas tad bhoḥ skanda gṛhāṇa kārmukam idaṃ nirṇīyatām antaram // VidSrk_45.20 *(1561) //
analyzed: tatra ādhāra nibandhanaḥ yadi bhavet ādheya dharma udayaḥ tat bhoḥ skanda gṛhāṇa kārmukam idam nirṇīyatām antaram  /

original: drāṅ niṣpeṣaviśīrṇavajraśakalapratyuptarūḍhavraṇa- granthyudbhāsini bhaṅgam ogham aghavan mātaṅgadantodyame /

original: bhartur nandanadevatāviracitasragdāmni bhūmeḥ sutā vīraśrīr iva yasya vakṣasi jagadvīrasya viśrāmyatu // VidSrk_45.21 *(1562) //
analyzed: bhartuḥ nandana devatā viracita sraj dāmni bhūmeḥ sutā vīra śrīḥ iva yasya vakṣasi jagadvīrasya viśrāmyatu  /

original: majjaty āmajjamajjanmaṇimasṛṇaphaṇācakravāle phaṇīndre yatsenoddāmahelābharacalitamahāśailakīlāṃ babhāra /

original: kṛcchrāt pātālamūlāvilabahulanirālambajambālaniṣṭhaḥ pṛṣṭhāṣṭhīlapratiṣṭhām avanim avanamat karparaḥ kūrmarājaḥ // VidSrk_46.2 *(1564) //

original: nirmajjaccakraśalyākulataraṇikarottāḍitāśvīyadatta- dvitrāvaskandamandaḥ katham api calati syandano bhānavīyaḥ // VidSrk_46.3 *(1565) //

analyzed: murāreḥ

original: sarvakṣatrabhujoṣmaśātanakalāduḥśīladoḥśālino vaṃśe tasya babhūvur adbhutaguṇā dhārādharitrībhujaḥ // VidSrk_46.7 *(1569) //

original: yannistriṃśahatodgatair ariśiraścakrair babhūva kṣaṇaṃ loke cāndramase vidhuntudaghaṭāvaskandakolāhalaḥ /
analyzed: yat nistriṃśa hata udgataiḥ ari śiraḥ cakraiḥ babhūva kṣaṇam loke cāndramase vidhuntuda ghaṭa avaskanda kolāhalaḥ

original: kiṃ cāmībhir api sphuranmaṇitayā caṇḍāṃśukoṭibhramaṃ bibhrāṇair udapādi rāhubhuvane bhūyān subhikṣotsavaḥ // VidSrk_46.8 *(1570) //
analyzed: kim ca amībhiḥ api sphurat maṇi tayā caṇḍa aṃśu koṭi bhramam bibhrāṇaiḥ udapādi rāhu bhuvane bhūyān subhikṣa utsavaḥ

original: tenedaṃ suramandiraṃ ghaṭayatā ṭaṅkāvalīnirdalat- pāṣāṇaprakaraḥ kṛto 'yam akhilaḥ kṣīṇo girīṇāṃ gaṇaḥ /
analyzed: tena idam sura mandiram ghaṭayatā ṭaṅka āvalī nirdalat pāṣāṇa prakaraḥ kṛtaḥ yam akhilaḥ kṣīṇaḥ girīṇām gaṇaḥ

original: arthibhyo vasu varṣatā punar asau saṃrūḍharatnāṅkura- śreṇismeraśiraḥsahasraśikharaḥ saṃvardhito rohaṇaḥ // VidSrk_46.9 *(1571) //
analyzed: arthibhyaḥ vasu varṣatā punar asau saṃrūḍha ratna aṅkura śreṇi smera śiraḥ sahasra śikharaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ rohaṇaḥ  /

original: surāṇāṃ pātāsau sa punar atipuṇyaikahṛdayo grahas tasyāsthāne gurur ucitamārge sa nirataḥ /
analyzed: surāṇām pātā asau sa punar ati puṇya eka hṛdayaḥ grahaḥ tasya asthāne guruḥ ucita mārge sa nirataḥ

original: karas tasyātyarthaṃ vahati śatakoṭipraṇayitāṃ sa sarvasvaṃ dātā tṛṇam iva sureśaṃ vijayate // VidSrk_46.10 *(1572) //
analyzed: karaḥ tasya atyartham vahati śata koṭi praṇayi tām sa sarva svam dātā tṛṇam iva sureśam vijayate  /

original: jīvākṛṣṭiṃ sa cakre mṛdhabhuvi dhanuṣaḥ śatrur āsīd gatāsur lakṣāptir mārgaṇānām abhavad aribale tadyaśas tena labdham /

original: muktā tena kṣameti tvaritam arigaṇair uttamāṅgaiḥ pratīṣṭhā pañcatvaṃ dveṣisainye sthitam avanipatir nāpa saṃkhyāntaraṃ sa // VidSrk_46.11
analyzed: muktā tena kṣamā iti tvaritam ari gaṇaiḥ uttamāṅgaiḥ pratīṣṭhā pañcatvam dveṣi sainye sthitam avanipatiḥ nā āpa saṃkhyā antaram sa

original: yeṣāṃ kalpamahīruhāṃ marakatavyājena tair arthibhir vyakrīyante śalāṭavo 'pi maṇayas te padmarāgādayaḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām kalpa mahīruhām marakata vyājena taiḥ arthibhiḥ vyakrīyante maṇayaḥ te padmarāga ādayaḥ

analyzed: na prāptāni purā na samprati na ca prāptau dṛḍha pratyayaḥ vāñchā mātra parigrahāṇi api vayam tyaktum na tāni kṣamāḥ  /

original: agre gītaṃ sarasakavayaḥ pārśvayor dākṣiṇātyāḥ paścāl līlāvalayaraṇitaṃ cāmaragrāhiṇīnām /
analyzed: agre gītam sarasa kavayaḥ pārśvayoḥ dākṣiṇātyāḥ paścāt līlā valaya raṇitam cāmara grāhiṇīnām

original: yady etat syāt kuru bhavarase lampaṭatvaṃ tadānīṃ no cec cetaḥ praviśa paramabrahmaṇi prārthanaiṣā // VidSrk_48.12 *(1605) //
analyzed: yadi etat syāt kuru bhava rase lampaṭa tvam tadānīm no ced cetaḥ praviśa parama brahmaṇi prārthanā eṣā

original: utpalarājasya
analyzed: utpalarājasya

analyzed: dhik dhik tān krimi nirviśeṣa vapuṣaḥ sphūrjat mahā siddhayaḥ niṣkandīkṛta śānti ye ca tapaḥ kārā gṛheṣu āsate

original: hātavyāyam asaṃstavāya visaraḥ saṃsāra ityādikaṃ sarvasyaiva hi vāci cetasi punaḥ puṇyātmanaḥ kasyacit // VidSrk_48.17 *(1610) //

analyzed: bhartṛhareḥ

original: dharmasyotsavavaijayanti mukuṭasragveṇi gaurīpates tvāṃ ratnākarapatni jahnutanaye bhāgīrathi prārthaye /

analyzed: vākkūṭasya

analyzed: kāmam śīrṇa palāśa saṃhati kṛtām kanthām vasānaḥ vane kuryām ambubhiḥ api a yācita sukhaiḥ prāṇa avabandha sthitim

original: sāṅgaglāni savepitaṃ sacakitaṃ sāntarnidāghajvaraṃ vaktuṃ na tv aham utsaheya kṛpaṇaṃ dehīty avadyaṃ vacaḥ // VidSrk_48.23 *(1616) //

original: itthaṃ khaṭvāṅgakoṭau prakaṭitadaśanaṃ mañjuguñjatsamīraṃ rāgāndhānām ivoccair upahasitam aho mohajālaṃ kapālam // VidSrk_48.26 *(1619) //

original: kṣāntaṃ na kṣamayā gṛhocitasukhaṃ tyaktaṃ na saṃtoṣataḥ soḍhā duḥsahaśītavātatapanakleśā na taptaṃ tapaḥ /

original: dhyātaṃ vittam aharniśaṃ na ca punas tattvāntaraṃ śāśvataṃ tat tat karma kṛtaṃ yad eva munibhis tais taiḥ phalair vañcitam // VidSrk_48.39

original: jānann apy avaśī vivekavirahān majjann avidyāmbudhau śṛṅgārīyati putrakāmyati bata kṣetrīyati strīyati // VidSrk_48.41 *(1634) //

original: ataḥ saṃyoge 'smin paravati viyoge ca sahaje kimādhāraḥ premā kimadhikaraṇāḥ santu ca śucaḥ // VidSrk_48.42 *(1635) //
analyzed: atas saṃyoge smin paravati viyoge ca sahaje kimādhāraḥ premā kimadhikaraṇāḥ santu ca śucaḥ

analyzed: bhartṛhareḥ

analyzed: keśaṭasya
